title: Prime Minister to make a special statement tonight
body_lines: Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa is scheduled to deliver a special statement today (11) on the current economic situation in the country.

The Prime Minister’s Office said that arrangements have been made to broadcast a special statement on the current economic situation of Sri Lanka by Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa over all the television and radio channels tonight at 7.30pm.
The PM’s special statement will be telecasted on TV Derana and Ada Derana 24 at the abovementioned time.
